alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Johns County through 630 PM EDT... At 600 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Saint Augustine Shores, or near Saint Augustine, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Saint Augustine Beach, Saint Augustine Shores, Butler Beach, Vilano Beach, Saint Augustine South, Anastasia, Dupont Center and Elkton. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns
